form.label: Kafka Sink task - Entity health view

search.query: | mstats latest(_value) as value WHERE `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_connect.worker.task-startup-failure-total" OR metric_name="kafka_connect.worker.connector-startup-failure-total" OR metric_name="kafka_connect.worker.time-since-last-rebalance-ms" OR metric_name="kafka_connect.worker.task-count" jolokia_agent_url=$jolokia_agent_url$ by metric_name | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(kafka_connect.*) as "*" | eval duration=tostring('worker.time-since-last-rebalance-ms', "duration") | fields worker.connector-startup-failure-total, worker.task-startup-failure-total, worker.task-count, duration
